format: JavaScript (React testing code, likely using Jest and React Testing Library)
description: This file contains smoke tests for routing and page rendering in a React application, checking access redirection, page content rendering for authenticated and unauthenticated states, and mocking network responses.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up mock resets and clears localStorage before each test.

methods.name: afterAll
methods.description: Restores the original fetch method after all tests are run.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual smoke test scenarios for different routes and authentication states.
